name: Storm Throw
summary: Inflicts damage and will always result in a critical hit unless the target has Battle Armor, Shell Armor, or is under Lucky Chant.
viability: Storm Throw has a total pre-STAB power of 90 with the critical hit. It will always hit through Reflect and Defense boost, due to the fact that it always results in a crit. Throh and Pangoro really like using it for that reason.
